pullrequest.title: Adapt gazebo build to new make tests

content.raw:
Update: I've include the brew and windows changes.

For brew, I've implemented a generic hook. It is not very clean code but it allows to define hooks in the same way that we do with linux scripts, using multiline with no union between commands just end of lines.

Tested here: http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/All/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64/746/
content.html:
Update: I've include the brew and windows changes.

For brew, I've implemented a generic hook. It is not very clean code but it allows to define hooks in the same way that we do with linux scripts, using multiline with no union between commands just end of lines.

Tested here: http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/All/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64/746/
